text.example: Anything that has mass and occupy a space

instruction.example: Assinment must be submitted before noon

items.example: Students should be able to react sulfuric acid with insoluble copper (II) oxide to prepare an aqueous solution of the salt

bigQuestion.example: If the world runs out of salt, how do we make salts in the lab?

description.example: The purpose of this experiment is to teach students the separation technique of liquid-liquid homogeneous mixture using the fractional distillation method. This practical module has three tasks to be completed by the students

items.example: The Big Question Section: Students are challenged with a problem that illustrates real-life practical applications of the making soluble salts experiment.
